title: The Star Wars x Le Creuset collection features Darth Vader Dutch ovens and Porg pie birds
text:
Le Creuset has had its fair share of Disney collaborations, including Mickey Mouse ramekins, Beauty and the Beast Dutch ovens, and red apple-shaped casserole dishes, a la Snow White. Now, it’s adding some Star Wars-themed cookware.

The array of products featured in the Star Wars x Le Creuset collection is impressive: there’s a “Han Solo in Carbonite” roaster, a Porg pie bird (a ceramic bird you put in the middle of your pies to let the steam out while they’re baking), Death Star and Millennium Falcon silicone trivets, Dutch ovens and mini cocottes that come in BB-8, R2-D2 and C-3PO finishes, and a Darth Vader Dutch oven.

Be sure to watch the video below with the sound on because there’s nothing funnier than some cookware being introduced to the most dramatic symphony music and some Darth Vader breathing sound effects.

Introducing the @starwars x Le Creuset Collection, available for purchase November 1st exclusively at select Le Creuset boutique stores, online, and from @yuppiechef. Sign up to our newsletter to be notified when #StarWarsXLeCreuset goes live: https://t.co/I9ErhIUmoI pic.twitter.com/RLL8z28TN2 — LeCreusetSA (@LeCreusetSA) October 4, 2019

They’ll be available on November 1st at Le Creuset stores and online as well as on Yuppie Chef. There’s no pricing information yet, but given that Le Creuset makes the holy grail of Dutch ovens that range anywhere from $200 to $300, we can expect the prices to be around that amount. But maybe if you wait around long enough, you’ll be able to find the items on the shelves of your local TJ Maxx in a few months. Then you can use the Force — so you don’t burn your caramelizing onions.

If you’re looking for something truly exclusive though, look no further than the $900 limited-edition Tatooine round dutch oven. It’s hand-painted, and only nine of them will be made, to celebrate the “9-part Skywalker Saga.” You can sign up here to purchase it when it goes on sale, or you can save hundreds of dollars and just purchase a regular dutch oven and put two round stickers on them.

Updated October 4th, 2019 2:50PM ET: This story has been updated to include the Tatooine dutch oven.
description: The Star Wars x Le Creuset collection features a "Han Solo in Carbonite" roaster, a Porg pie bird, Death Star and Millennium Falcon silicone trivets, Dutch ovens and mini cocottes that come in BB-8, R2-D2, and C-3PO finishes, and a Darth Vader Dutch oven.
